title: Voices of the Covid bereaved: 'Our loved ones aren't just a number' – video
description:
Thousands of bereaved families are calling for a public inquiry into the UK’s handling of the coronavirus pandemic, looking at everything from lockdowns to test and trace failings.

We spoke to four people from the Covid-19 Bereaved Families for Justice group about the impact losing a loved one has had on them, and about their search for answers in a country with the worst death toll per capita of any of the world’s large economies

  • Pressure mounts on Boris Johnson to launch coronavirus inquiry
